title: misc/cgo/testshared: fails on 1.5 release with gccgo 5.2
body:
````
##### ../misc/cgo/testshared
2015/08/24 12:13:31 elf.Open failed: open /tmp/testshared842877175/pkg/gccgo_linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_fPIC/shlibs/libdep.so: no such file or directory
exit status 1
FAIL	_/builddir/build/BUILD/go/misc/cgo/testshared	2.382s
2015/08/24 12:13:31 Failed: exit status 1
+ :
+ du -a /tmp/
28	/tmp/testshared842877175/pkg/gccgo_linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_fPIC/libdep.a
32	/tmp/testshared842877175/pkg/gccgo_linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_fPIC

4	/tmp/testshared842877175/pkg/linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_dynlink/dep2.shlibname
12	/tmp/testshared842877175/pkg/linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_dynlink/dep.a
4	/tmp/testshared842877175/pkg/linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_dynlink/dep2.a
20	/tmp/testshared842877175/pkg/linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_dynlink/libdep.so

64	/tmp/testshared842877175/pkg/linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_dynlink
100	/tmp/testshared842877175/pkg

8	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/exe

8	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/trivial
4	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/dep/dep.go
4	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/dep/gccgo.go
4	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/dep/stubs.go
4	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/dep/asm.s
20	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/dep
4	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/execgo/exe.go
8	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/execgo
4	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/exe2/exe2.go
8	/tmp/testshared842877175/src/exe2

316	/tmp/testshared842877175
````

Indeed such a file was not generated in the `_fPIC/shlibs/libdep.so`
